when

public int when(int year,
                boolean shift,
                int base)
Description copied from class: HolInfo
When was this holiday in a given year?
Overrides:
when in class HolInfo
Tags copied from class: HolInfo
Parameters:
year - (-ve means BC, +ve means AD, 0 not permitted.)
shift= - ACTUAL = false if you want the actual date of the holiday. = SHIFTED = true if you want the date taken off work.
base - PROCLAIMED=based on date holiday was officially proclaimed CELEBRATED=based on date holiday was first celebrated
Returns:
ordinal days since Jan 1, 1970. return NULL_ORDINAL if the holiday was not celebrated in that year.
